title: A new notion of semiprime submodules
abstract:
We introduce a new concept of a semiprime submodule. We show that a submodule
of a finitely generated module over a commutative ring is semiprime if and only
if it is radical, that is, an intersection of prime submodules. Using our
notion, we also provide a new characterization of radical submodules of
finitely generated modules over commutative rings.
